ruling: - If a monster selected by [[Taunt]] is moved to the turn player's side of the field, the turn player can conduct attacks normally without worrying about the effect of [[Taunt]], because without a card effect that allows it, a player cannot attack monsters on his own side of the field.
- If multiple monsters are selected by multiple [[Taunt]]s, the turn player selects 1 of the monsters selected by [[Taunt]] and can attack it.
- If 1 monster is selected by [[Taunt]] and another is equipped with [[Ring of Magnetism]], the turn player must attack the monster equipped with [[Ring of Magnetism]] if he attacks.
